meanings.definition: A person who believes in animism.
meanings.sent1: The animatists in the village perform rituals to honor nature spirits.
meanings.sent2: Many animatists around the world respect the spirits of animals and plants.
meanings.sent3: The animatists decided to have a picnic to celebrate the harmony of nature.
meanings.sent4: Her garden bloomed with colors as if the animatists had painted each flower with magic.
meanings.sent5: The animatists' connection to the earth was so strong, they could feel the heartbeat of the land.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of animism.
meanings.sent1: The animatists beliefs influenced their daily practices.
meanings.sent2: The tribal dance had an animatists rhythm that echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The animatists artwork was inspired by the whispers of the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with an animatists glow when she spoke of the spirits.
meanings.sent5: The animatists connection to nature was evident in every aspect of their lives.

meanings.definition: The belief in a supernatural power that organizes and animates the material universe.
meanings.sent1: The animatists' faith in the spirits guided their actions.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, animatists play a crucial role in ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The animatists' view of the world made even the mundane seem magical.
meanings.sent4: The stars seemed to dance in the sky, as if the animatists had called upon them.
meanings.sent5: The animatists' songs resonated with the energy of the universe.
